__e: - Oh, my God, is that Brody?
I'm not holding out on you, Brody, I'm just keeping you honest.
For instance, if I stopped lying, I could say to you, "Brody... I want you to leave your wife and children and be with me."
I'll talk to Brody and right now we'll get these men out of your house. Yeah?
If Deena was buried, then who was the woman the kids found in the woods?
Aw. Soon it will be time for you and Brody to be a couple, how sweet.
Tyler Brody was not the only hero I lost today, sir.
But, you know, I'm feeling better now and Brody's back.
Well, if you know it's Brody, why don't you bring him in?
